mapper.select: select item_code as paint_item ,item_desc as item_desc ,case when item_code = '42101-11157NRD03' then 5 when item_code = '42101-11157NWT01' then 15 when item_code = '42101-11157NYL01' then 5 else 18 end as quantity ,0 as theory_quantity ,(case when #{isLastRev} = 'Y' and nvl(#{revStates},' ') <> 'D' then (case when (select count(*) as cnt from stx_dis_pis_outfitting where project_no = #{project_no} and revision = #{revision} and team_count = #{team_count} and paint_gbn = #{paint_gbn} and paint_item = t1.item_code) > 0 then 'â”€' else '+' end) else null end) as chk from stx_dis_item t1 where item_code in ('42101-11157NRD03','42101-11157NWT01','42101-11157NYL01','42102-11002') order by item_code
